questions.text: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI-SVD custom node?
questions.answer: The ComfyUI-SVD custom node allows users to generate videos from text descriptions using a Stable Diffusion model.

questions.text: Where can I find examples of ComfyUI-SVD in action?
questions.answer: Examples of ComfyUI-SVD can be found on the Comfy UI examples page: https://comfyanonymous.github.io/ComfyUI_examples/video/.

questions.text: Does ComfyUI officially support video generation from text?
questions.answer: Yes, ComfyUI now officially supports video generation from text thanks to the addition of the ComfyUI-SVD custom node.
